subject: Re: clone()
msgSnippet: ... everything ... of ... We deprecate for one release, then delete all deprecated methods as the first act of the next release. We ll have to go to some kind
messageBody:
--- In junit@egroups.com, Joi Ellis <joi@a...> wrote:
> I have a wish, too. When you change the public API, please
> deprecate the old calls, don't just delete them. Please?
>
> I upgraded to Junit 3.3.1, then backed it out again because
everything
> I have calls now-missing LoadingTestRunners! I have a whole bunch
of
> stuff automated, and it all broke. :(

We deprecate for one release, then delete all deprecated methods as
the first act of the next release. We'll have to go to some kind of
time-out-based deletion when we have more frequent releases.

Kent
